problems.title: Check Palindrome
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a string S, check if it is a palindrome.
A string is a palindrome if it reads the same backward as forward.

Return "True" if it is a palindrome, else "False".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
madam

Sample Output
True

Explanation:
madam read backwards is madam.

Sample Input
hello

Sample Output
False
problems.constraints:
1 <= |S| <= 10^5
S consists of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Compare characters from the start and end moving inwards.
If any mismatch found, it's not a palindrome.
